midemuda?shraddhawen dharmaya dakimabududahamata erehi panawalata pilithuruswamini, his labu kabal jalaye gilenawa dutuwemiwedanawen athmidima biya ha wedanawagiju lihiniya men papi maraya paradawamuniwi pahan wi sith sanasewabrahma guna athi mawupiyoshri subramaniyam wiharastha shri wimalananda daham pasalachuladhamma samadana suthrayadukata hethuwa thrushnawayikaraniya meththa suthrayalokaya naraka da?aananda hamuduruwopawahan parithyaga kirime pinkamakputhagen paligath piyek...therani giniwan dakinnata sudusukama kumakda?mada yi math ussan aawa achcharu pettiyaragayen thorawa rasawindinnapupurassa shri subramaniyam wiharayasithe sabawapirisudu kalawu sitha pandu bhajanaye ehema nathnam sayam bhajanaye ebu pirisudu wasthrayak wage mana pahaya gannawa.
